title: Man fatally shot in St. Louis Place neighborhood
content:
ST. LOUIS • A man was fatally shot in the chest early Tuesday in the 1600 block of Hogan Street.
Police say the unidentified victim appeared to be in his mid 20s.
Officers got a call for a shooting at about 1:50 a.m. Tuesday, on Hogan near Mullanphy Street in the St. Louis Place neighborhood. When police arrived, the victim had already been taken to a hospital, where he died.
Police had no information on any motive or suspects.
